author: Good Enough
description:
Bang Kwang Central Prison, Thailand’s notorious “Big Tiger”. Known as one of the harshest prisons in the world, Bang Kwang has a reputation for overcrowding, welded leg irons and brutal daily routines. With thousands crammed into cells, minimal food, and relentless discipline, this maximum‑security facility has earned its place among the most feared prisons globally.

#youtubeshorts #shorts #documentary #truecrime #historicalfacts
title: Thailand's WORST Prison 💀😰 #didyouknow #prison #animation #unbelievable
